short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A chrome extension to control volume per tab

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A simple tool to control volume of each tab with a audio element with easy to use UI.

Version - 4.3.5 (28-5-2024)
- Added seek forward and backward
- fixed minor bugs
